SELECT cli_id, biz_reg_no, cli_add, cli_ceo, cli_da, cli_mgr_name, cli_mgr_phone, cli_nm, cli_pc, cli_phone, d.det_nm as cli_type FROM client c left join code_detail d on c.cli_type = d.det_id
AND ( cli_nm LIKE '%' || #{search_term} || '%' OR cli_ceo LIKE '%' || #{search_term} || '%' OR biz_reg_no LIKE '%' || #{search_term} || '%' )
ORDER BY cli_id ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
